text: Abraham Patusca da Silveira, best known as Araken Patusca or Araken (17 July 1905 – 24 January 1990), or Araken, is a former Brazilian football player. He has played for Brazil national team. ==Honours== ===Club=== * Campeonato Paulista: :São Paulo: 1931 :Santos FC: 1935 ===Individual=== * Campeonato Paulista top scorer: :Santos FC: 1927 (31 goals) Category:1905 births Category:1990 deaths Category:Footballers from Santos, São Paulo Category:Association football forwards Category:1930 FIFA World Cup players
title: Araken Patusca
